1.0.3.name: wordpress/gmap-targeting
1.0.3.description: Set google map everywere on your site using shortcodes like [gmap_targeting post_id=2] in post or in wp theme. Each map belongs to post or page. To start using this plugin simply install it. Now, in pages/posts appears panel "Google Map Targeting". After putting a geographical point, map size, map type, map position in the text, the text in the map info window - press the update button to save post/page. That is all ....
